ca.cmput301.team13.taskman
Class ImageCaptureActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.FulfillmentActivity
          ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.ImageCaptureActivity

public class ImageCaptureActivity
extends FulfillmentActivity

ImageCaptureActivity is the activity that allows the user take a photo or select one from the device's library to fulfill an image requirement. This activity should be launched with an intent created by FulfillmentIntentFactory.

          Indicates whether or not a photo was taken.

onActivityResult

protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                Intent data)
Handles the result condition and/or returned data from the Android built-in camera and also from the Photo Gallery selection. Converts returned photo's into bitmaps and sets the screen to show a preview of the selected image.

Parameters:
requestCode - specifies which type of activity we are returning from
resultCode - signifies the success or fail of the intent
data - The data returned from the intent

the bitmap to be saved

Sets the bitmap to be saved.

Parameters:
selectedImage - the chosen bitmap image
